CustomField.description: If true, allows users to see daily notes with daily hours if note fields have been added to the Timecard Approval Columns field set. The default value is false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, allows users to see daily notes with daily hours if note fields have been added to the Timecard Approval Columns field set. The default value is false.
CustomField.label: Show Daily Notes With Hours
